content: Yes, the shift towards streaming services may have an impact on the success of big budget films. With more films being released directly to streaming platforms, some viewers may choose to watch these from the comfort of their homes instead of paying for a more expensive theatrical release. However, it is worth noting that the experience of watching a big budget film in a theater cannot be replicated at home, and for some viewers, this may still be worth the cost. Additionally, many major studios also have deals with streaming platforms that provide a significant revenue stream, so even if films are not as successful at the box office, these platforms may provide an alternative means of financial success. Ultimately, the future of big budget films in the age of streaming is uncertain, and it will be interesting to see how the industry adapts to these new challenges and opportunities.
